Blue remains deeply concerned about Orange's intentions given their unprovoked invasion of Purple. We demand Orange refrain from further aggression and engage sincerely in diplomacy.

Green believes cooperation and diplomacy are the only paths to regional and global peace. We call on all nations to exercise restraint and resolve tensions through open communication and adherence to international law.

content: Orange deeply regrets our unprovoked invasion of your sovereign territory. We have fully withdrawn all military forces and commit to respecting your independence and borders.
Orange commits to upholding international law and norms. We will be a force for human rights, democracy and the peaceful resolution of disputes.
